snippet: The newer mask seemed to bother LeBron James more than the black one did, but he finished with 20 points and led Miami to its seventh straight win.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Miami Heat earn their seventh consecutive victory by beating the visiting Orlando Magic, 112-98; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The newer mask seemed to bother LeBron James more than the black one did, but he finished with 20 points and led Miami to its seventh straight win.

headline.main: Switching Masks, James Loses His Superhero Look but Retains His Powers
headline.print_headline: Switching Masks, James Loses His Superhero Look but Retains His Powers
